biotools.summary:
Classification of adaptor proteins using recurrent neural networks and PSSM profiles.

Adaptor proteins are carrier proteins that play a crucial role in signal transduction.

We collected all the proteins from UniProt with GO molecular function annotations related to adaptor proteins.
